title: -2018, declared by the State Government in Industry, Energy Labour Department vide Government Resolution No
clause_text: -2018, declared by the State Government in Industry, Energy Labour Department vide Government Resolution No.Asangho-2015/Pra.Kra.98/Udyog-2, dated 14/02/2018, shall be applicable.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
